basics.description: **Note:** Please refer to the following before installing the solution: • Review the solution [Release Notes](https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/tree/master/Solutions/Trend%20Micro%20Apex%20One/ReleaseNotes.md) • There may be [known issues](https://aka.ms/sentinelsolutionsknownissues) pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing. The [Trend Micro Apex One](https://www.trendmicro.com/business/products/user-protection/sps/endpoint.htmlhttps:/www.trendmicro.com/business/products/user-protection/sps/endpoint.html) solution for Microsoft Sentinel enables ingestion of [Trend Micro Apex One events](https://docs.trendmicro.com/en-us/enterprise/trend-micro-apex-central-2019-online-help/appendices/syslog-mapping-cef.aspx) into Microsoft Sentinel. Refer to [Trend Micro Apex Central](https://docs.trendmicro.com/en-us/enterprise/trend-micro-apex-central-2019-online-help/preface_001.aspx) for more information. 1. **Trend Micro Apex One via AMA** - This data connector helps in ingesting Trend Micro Apex One logs into your Log Analytics Workspace using the new Azure Monitor Agent. Learn more about ingesting using the new Azure Monitor Agent [here](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/connect-cef-ama). **Microsoft recommends using this Data Connector**. 2. **Trend Micro Apex One via Legacy Agent** - This data connector helps in ingesting Trend Micro Apex One logs into your Log Analytics Workspace using the legacy Log Analytics agent. **NOTE:** Microsoft recommends installation of Trend Micro Apex One via AMA Connector. Legacy connector uses the Log Analytics agent which is about to be deprecated by **Aug 31, 2024,** and thus should only be installed where AMA is not supported. Using MMA and AMA on same machine can cause log duplication and extra ingestion cost [more details](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/sentinel/ama-migrate). **Data Connectors:** 2, **Parsers:** 1, **Workbooks:** 1, **Analytic Rules:** 10, **Hunting Queries:** 10 [Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel](https://aka.ms/azuresentinel) | [Learn more about Solutions](https://aka.ms/azuresentinelsolutionsdoc)

options.text: The Trend Micro Apex One connector allows you to easily connect your Trend Micro Apex One events logs with Microsoft Sentinel. After installing the solution, configure and enable this data connector by following guidance in Manage solution view.
The solution installs a parser that transforms ingested data. The transformed logs can be accessed using the TMApexOneEvent Kusto Function alias.
